## If significant:
# Perform pairwise comparisons
stat.test <- adat %>%
  wilcox_test(Shannon ~ Run) %>%
  adjust_pvalue(method = "BH") %>%
  add_significance("p.adj") %>% 
  add_x_position(x = "Run") %>%
  p_format("p.adj", accuracy = 0.0001, trailing.zero = TRUE, new.col = TRUE)
